re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer

Class ExploredDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.explorer.ExploredDirectory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Explorer

    public class ExploredDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    The Explored Directory

    A directory, with some useful methods. Generated by Explorer.dir or an other Explored Directory.

    Since:
    3.0.0-BETA
    Version:
    3.0.2-BETA
    Author:
    Litarvan

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileList allRecursive()
      Generate a list of all files and folders, recursively (sub-folder and sub-files included) in this folder
      FileList files()
      Return the files inside this directory (not the directories, not recusrively)
      java.io.File get()
      Return this directory as a File

      Return a file of this directory

      Return a list of the files/folders in this folder

      Return a sub directory of the current one
      FileList subs()
